value.title: Using Single Sign-on with the Power BI Gateway
value.excerpt: Let's dig into the Power BI gateway and Single Sign-On (SSO) using Kerberos!  This can be used for both DirectQuery and refreshing a Power BI dataset.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-sso-overview  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

Process Monitor https://learn.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/procmon  Rui Romano's Gateway Monitor Report https://github.com/RuiRomano/pbigtwmonitor
